attributes.action: change planning so that planning consent is required to amalgamate two or more small shops into one larger unit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Local Authorities have no powers to protect small retail units. A change in the Law which stated that any amalgamation of two or more units in to a larger unit would allow Local Authorities to control the spread of "Clone Town Britain" and to agree with developers, under section 106 agreements, to provide affordable shops as part of any planning consent.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to change planning so that planning consent is required to amalgamate two or more small shops into one larger unit.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=Smallshops


Her Majesty's Government
